price: Албатта, у Бизнинг ҳузуримиздаги Лавҳул-Маҳфуздадир, олийдир, ҳакимдир.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِيٓ أُمِّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَدَيۡنَا لَعَلِيٌّ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu fī ummi al-kitābi ladaynā laʿaliyyun ḥakīmun
